meaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>drum</radical> and a <radical>branch</radical> and... well, what else would you do? You would <kanji>drum</kanji> or <kanji>beat</kanji> them together.
readingMnemonic: Who loves to <kanji>drum</kanji> things together and make a huge racket? <reading>子</reading>s (こ), of course.
